Author: Gateway#3763
Content:
[dscrd-hush] <phm87> well, atomicdex is a confusing name: let's say
- mm2/atomicdex is the tech
- atomicdex is the phone version
- hyperdex is the desktop version (opensource and dev paid by hyperdex)
- chameleon (or another name ?) is another version from a company
All the 3 GUI shares the same pool of atomic swaps

Now, equihash is not available. I shared my code with him so he can also let ppl rent equihash. I can also add it on my pool (but I'll need to allow autotrading OR to make a deal with a whale)
